trans-unit.source: Defines properties and methods common to all annotations.
trans-unit.target: Definerer egenskaper og metoder som er felles for alle merknader.

trans-unit.source: This is an abstract class.
trans-unit.target: Dette er en abstrakt klasse.

trans-unit.source: Annotations are commonly used to comment or elaborate on chart elements such as data points.
trans-unit.target: Merknader brukes vanligvis til å kommentere eller gjøre diagramelementer, for eksempel datapunkt.

trans-unit.source: Annotations can also be used to draw custom shapes.
trans-unit.target: Merknader kan også brukes til å tegne egendefinerte former.

trans-unit.source: By default, annotations are positioned using relative coordinates, with (0,0) representing the top-left corner, and (100,100) representing the bottom-right corner of the chart image.
trans-unit.target: Som standard plasseres merknader med relative koordinater (0,0) som representerer det øverste venstre hjørnet, og (100,100) som representerer nederst til høyre for diagrambildet.

trans-unit.source: It is also possible to switch from this relative coordinate system to a system that uses axis values.
trans-unit.target: Det er også mulig å bytte fra denne relative koordinatsystemet til et system som bruker verdiene aksen.

trans-unit.source: With an axis coordinate system, X and Y, which represent the position of the top-left corner of an annotation, are set using X axis and Y axis values, instead of values that range from 0-100.
trans-unit.target: Med en akse koordinatsystem, X og Y, som representerer plasseringen av øverste venstre hjørne for en merknad, er angitt med X-aksen og verdiene for Y-aksen, i stedet for verdier fra 0 til 100.

trans-unit.source: There are two ways to use axis values when you specify the position and size of an annotation: - Set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Annotation.AxisX%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Annotation.AxisY%2A> or both of these annotation properties to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartArea.AxisX%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartArea.AxisY%2A> property values of a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Series.ChartArea%2A> object.
trans-unit.target: To måter å bruke akseverdiene når du angir plasseringen og størrelsen for en merknad: – Det er angitt i <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Annotation.AxisX%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Annotation.AxisY%2A>eller begge av disse merknad egenskapene til det <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartArea.AxisX%2A>og <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartArea.AxisY%2A>egenskapsverdiene for en <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Series.ChartArea%2A>objektet.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Series.ChartArea%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartArea.AxisY%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartArea.AxisX%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Annotation.AxisY%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Annotation.AxisX%2A>

trans-unit.source: - Use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Annotation.AnchorDataPoint%2A> property to anchor the annotation to a data point.
trans-unit.target: -Bruk av <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Annotation.AnchorDataPoint%2A>egenskapen forankrer merknaden til ett datapunkt.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Annotation.AnchorDataPoint%2A>

trans-unit.source: In this case, its positioning is automatically calculated.
trans-unit.target: I dette tilfellet beregnes den plassering automatisk.

trans-unit.source: All annotations are derived from the Annotation class, which can be used to set attributes common to all Annotation objects, such as color, position, anchoring and so forth.
trans-unit.target: Alle merknader er avledet fra klassen merknad, som kan brukes til å angi attributter felles for alle merknad-objekter, for eksempel for posisjonen, anchoring og så videre.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Annotation"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Initialiserer en ny forekomst av den <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Annotation"> </xref> klasse.

trans-unit.source: This is the default constructor and should not be used.
trans-unit.target: Dette er standardkonstruktøren og bør ikke brukes.

trans-unit.source: Annotation is an abstract class and cannot be created directly.
trans-unit.target: Kan ikke opprette direkte merknaden er en abstrakt klasse.

trans-unit.source: To create a new annotation object, use constructors of classes such as <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LineAnnotation>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.RectangleAnnotation>, and the like.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil opprette et nytt merknad-objekt, kan du bruke konstruktører klasser for eksempel <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LineAnnotation>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.RectangleAnnotation>, og annet.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.RectangleAnnotation> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LineAnnotation>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the content alignment of an annotation.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir justeringen innhold for en merknad.

trans-unit.source: This property is used to align text for <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.TextAnnotation>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.RectangleAnnotation>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.EllipseAnnotation> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.CalloutAnnotation> objects, and to align a non-scaled image inside an <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ImageAnnotation> object.
trans-unit.target: Denne egenskapen brukes til å justere tekst for <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.TextAnnotation>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.RectangleAnnotation>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.EllipseAnnotation>og <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.CalloutAnnotation>objekter, og til å justere en ikke-skalert bildet i et <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ImageAnnotation>objektet.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ImageAnnotation> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.CalloutAnnotation> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.EllipseAnnotation> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.RectangleAnnotation> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.TextAnnotation>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.ContentAlignment"></xref> enumeration value that represents the content alignment.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Drawing.ContentAlignment"> </xref> opplistingsverdien som representerer innhold justering.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a flag that specifies whether the end user is allowed to move the annotation anchor using a mouse.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir et flagg som angir om brukeren kan flytte merknadsanker ved hjelp av musen.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the annotation anchor may be moved; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Hvis merknadsanker kan flyttes; Ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a flag that specifies whether the end user is allowed to move an annotation using a mouse.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir et flagg som angir om brukeren kan flytte merknaden ved hjelp av musen.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the annotation may be moved; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Hvis en merknad kan flyttes; Ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a flag that specifies whether the end user is allowed to move the points of a polygon annotation using a mouse.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir et flagg som angir om brukeren kan flytte punktene i en polygon merknad med musen.

trans-unit.source: This property needs to be set to `true` to free draw a polyline annotation.
trans-unit.target: Denne egenskapen må være satt til `true` til å tegne gratis en polygonlinje merknad.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the polygon annotation's points may be moved; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>om polygonbanen for merknaden punkt kan flyttes; Ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a flag that specifies whether the end user is allowed to resize an annotation using a mouse.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir et flagg som angir om brukeren kan endre størrelse på en merknad med musen.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the annotation may be resized; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Hvis merknaden kan endres; Ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a flag that specifies whether the end user is allowed to select an annotation using a mouse.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir et flagg som angir om brukeren kan velge en merknad med musen.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the annotation may be selected; otherwise <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Hvis en merknad kan velges; Ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a flag that specifies whether the text in an annotation may be edited when the end user double clicks the text.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir et flagg som angir om teksten i merknaden kan redigeres når brukeren klikker doble teksten.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the annotation text may be edited; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Hvis merknadsteksten kan redigeres. Ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the alignment of an annotation to the anchor point.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir justeringen for en merknad til ankerpunktet.

trans-unit.source: The annotation must be anchored by either using the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Annotation.AnchorDataPoint%2A> property, or by setting the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Annotation.AnchorX%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Annotation.AnchorY%2A> properties.
trans-unit.target: Merknaden må være forankret ved hjelp av den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Annotation.AnchorDataPoint%2A>-egenskapen, eller ved å angi den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Annotation.AnchorX%2A>og <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Annotation.AnchorY%2A>Egenskaper.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Annotation.AnchorY%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Annotation.AnchorX%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Annotation.AnchorDataPoint%2A>

trans-unit.source: Its <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Annotation.X%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Annotation.Y%2A> properties must be set to <xref:System.Double.NaN>.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Annotation.X%2A>og <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Annotation.Y%2A>Egenskaper må settes til <xref:System.Double.NaN>.</xref:System.Double.NaN> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Annotation.Y%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Annotation.X%2A>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.ContentAlignment"></xref> enumeration value that represents the alignment of the annotation to the anchor point.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Drawing.ContentAlignment"> </xref> opplistingsverdien som representerer justeringen for merknaden fra ankerpunktet.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the data point to which an annotation is anchored.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir for datapunktet til en merknad er forankret.

trans-unit.source: The annotation is anchored to the X and Y values of the specified data point, and automatically uses the same axes coordinates as the data point.
trans-unit.target: En merknad er forankret til X og Y-verdiene i det angitte datapunktet og bruker automatisk samme akser koordinatene som datapunktet.

trans-unit.source: To automatically position the annotation relative to the anchor point, make sure its <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Annotation.X%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Annotation.Y%2A> properties are set to <xref:System.Double.NaN>.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil automatisk plassere merknaden i forhold til ankerpunktet, kontroller at <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Annotation.X%2A>og <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Annotation.Y%2A>egenskapene er angitt til <xref:System.Double.NaN>.</xref:System.Double.NaN> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Annotation.Y%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Annotation.X%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Annotation.AnchorAlignment%2A> property can be used to change the automatic position alignment of the annotation to the anchor point.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Annotation.AnchorAlignment%2A>kan brukes til å justere automatisk posisjon merknaden til ankerpunktet.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Annotation.AnchorAlignment%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Annotation.AnchorOffsetX%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Annotation.AnchorOffsetY%2A> properties may be used to add extra spacing.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Annotation.AnchorOffsetX%2A>og <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Annotation.AnchorOffsetY%2A>Egenskaper som kan brukes til å legge til ekstra avstand.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Annotation.AnchorOffsetY%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Annotation.AnchorOffsetX%2A>

trans-unit.source: When you use this property, make sure the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Annotation.AnchorX%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Annotation.AnchorY%2A> properties are set to Double.NaN, as they have precedence.
trans-unit.target: Når du bruker denne egenskapen, må du kontrollere den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Annotation.AnchorX%2A>og <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Annotation.AnchorY%2A>egenskapene er angitt Double.NaN, fordi de har prioritet.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Annotation.AnchorY%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Annotation.AnchorX%2A>

trans-unit.source: Set this value to `null` to disable annotation anchoring to a data point.
trans-unit.target: Sett denne verdien til `null` å deaktivere merknad Forankring til ett datapunkt.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.DataPoint"></xref> object to which an annotation is anchored.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.DataPoint"> </xref> objekt som en merknad er forankret.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the name of a data point to which an annotation is anchored.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir navnet på en peker til en merknad er forankret.

trans-unit.source: A <xref uid="langword_csharp_string" name="string" href=""></xref> value that represents the name of the data point that an annotation is anchored to.
trans-unit.target: En <xref uid="langword_csharp_string" name="string" href=""> </xref> -verdi som representerer navnet på dataene for datapunkt som en merknad er forankret til.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the offset from the anchor point for the X position of an annotation.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir forskyvningen fra ankerpunktet for X-posisjonen for merknaden.

trans-unit.source: The annotation must be anchored using either the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Annotation.AnchorDataPoint%2A> or the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Annotation.AnchorX%2A> property, and its <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Annotation.X%2A> property must be set to <xref:System.Double.NaN>.
trans-unit.target: Merknaden må være forankret å bruke enten <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Annotation.AnchorDataPoint%2A>eller <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Annotation.AnchorX%2A>egenskapen, og den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Annotation.X%2A>egenskapen må være satt til <xref:System.Double.NaN>.</xref:System.Double.NaN> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Annotation.X%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Annotation.AnchorX%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Annotation.AnchorDataPoint%2A>

trans-unit.source: A <xref uid="langword_csharp_double" name="double" href=""></xref> value that represents the offset of the X position from the anchor point.
trans-unit.target: En <xref uid="langword_csharp_double" name="double" href=""> </xref> verdi som angir forskyvningen for X-posisjon fra ankerpunktet.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the offset from the anchor point for the Y position of an annotation.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir forskyvningen fra ankerpunktet for Y-posisjonen for merknaden.

trans-unit.source: The annotation must be anchored using either the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Annotation.AnchorDataPoint%2A> or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Annotation.AnchorY%2A> property, and its <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Annotation.Y%2A> property must be set to <xref:System.Double.NaN>.
trans-unit.target: Merknaden må være forankret å bruke enten <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Annotation.AnchorDataPoint%2A>eller <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Annotation.AnchorY%2A>egenskapen, og den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Annotation.Y%2A>egenskapen må være satt til <xref:System.Double.NaN>.</xref:System.Double.NaN> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Annotation.Y%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Annotation.AnchorY%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Annotation.AnchorDataPoint%2A>

trans-unit.source: A <xref uid="langword_csharp_double" name="double" href=""></xref> value that represents the offset of the Y position from the anchor point.
trans-unit.target: En <xref uid="langword_csharp_double" name="double" href=""> </xref> verdi som angir forskyvningen for Y-posisjon fra ankerpunktet.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the X coordinate to which the annotation is anchored.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir X-koordinaten som en merknad er forankret.

trans-unit.source: The annotation is anchored to the X coordinate and is specified in relative chart or axes coordinates, depending on the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Annotation.AxisX%2A> property value.
trans-unit.target: En merknad er forankret til X-koordinat og er angitt i relativ diagrammet eller aksen koordinater, avhengig av den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Annotation.AxisX%2A>egenskapsverdi.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Annotation.AxisX%2A>

trans-unit.source: To automatically position an annotation relative to an anchor point, make sure its <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Annotation.X%2A> property is set to <xref:System.Double.NaN>.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil automatisk plassere en merknad i forhold til en ankerpunktet, kontroller at den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Annotation.X%2A>er satt til <xref:System.Double.NaN>.</xref:System.Double.NaN> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Annotation.X%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Annotation.AnchorAlignment%2A> property can be used to change the automatic position alignment of the annotation to the anchor point.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Annotation.AnchorAlignment%2A>kan brukes til å justere automatisk posisjon merknaden til ankerpunktet.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Annotation.AnchorAlignment%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Annotation.AnchorOffsetX%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Annotation.AnchorOffsetY%2A> properties may be used to add extra spacing.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Annotation.AnchorOffsetX%2A>og <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Annotation.AnchorOffsetY%2A>Egenskaper som kan brukes til å legge til ekstra avstand.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Annotation.AnchorOffsetY%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Annotation.AnchorOffsetX%2A>

trans-unit.source: This property has a higher priority than the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Annotation.AnchorDataPoint%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Denne egenskapen har en høyere prioritet enn den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Annotation.AnchorDataPoint%2A>egenskapen.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Annotation.AnchorDataPoint%2A>

trans-unit.source: Set this value to <xref:System.Double.NaN> to disable annotation anchoring to the value.
trans-unit.target: Sett denne verdien til <xref:System.Double.NaN>å deaktivere merknad Forankring til verdien.</xref:System.Double.NaN>

trans-unit.source: A <xref uid="langword_csharp_double" name="double" href=""></xref> value that represents the X coordinate an annotation is anchored to.
trans-unit.target: En <xref uid="langword_csharp_double" name="double" href=""> </xref> verdi som representerer X-koordinaten som en merknad er forankret til.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the Y coordinate to which the annotation is anchored.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir Y-koordinaten som en merknad er forankret.

trans-unit.source: The annotation is anchored to the Y coordinate and is specified in relative chart or axes coordinates, depending on the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Annotation.AxisX%2A> property value.
trans-unit.target: En merknad er forankret til Y-koordinat og er angitt i relativ diagrammet eller aksen koordinater, avhengig av den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Annotation.AxisX%2A>egenskapsverdi.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Annotation.AxisX%2A>

trans-unit.source: To automatically position an annotation relative to an anchor point make sure its <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Annotation.Y%2A> property is set to <xref:System.Double.NaN>.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil automatisk for å plassere en merknad i forhold til forankring punkt Kontroller at den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Annotation.Y%2A>er satt til <xref:System.Double.NaN>.</xref:System.Double.NaN> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Annotation.Y%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Annotation.AnchorAlignment%2A> property can be used to change the automatic position alignment of the annotation to the anchor point.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Annotation.AnchorAlignment%2A>kan brukes til å justere automatisk posisjon merknaden til ankerpunktet.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Annotation.AnchorAlignment%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Annotation.AnchorOffsetX%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Annotation.AnchorOffsetY%2A> properties may be used to add extra spacing.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Annotation.AnchorOffsetX%2A>og <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Annotation.AnchorOffsetY%2A>Egenskaper som kan brukes til å legge til ekstra avstand.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Annotation.AnchorOffsetY%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Annotation.AnchorOffsetX%2A>

trans-unit.source: This property has a higher priority than the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Annotation.AnchorDataPoint%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Denne egenskapen har en høyere prioritet enn den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Annotation.AnchorDataPoint%2A>egenskapen.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Annotation.AnchorDataPoint%2A>

trans-unit.source: Set this value to <xref:System.Double.NaN> to disable annotation anchoring to the value.
trans-unit.target: Sett denne verdien til <xref:System.Double.NaN>å deaktivere merknad Forankring til verdien.</xref:System.Double.NaN>

trans-unit.source: A <xref uid="langword_csharp_double" name="double" href=""></xref> value that represents the Y coordinate an annotation is anchored to.
trans-unit.target: En <xref uid="langword_csharp_double" name="double" href=""> </xref> verdi som representerer Y-koordinaten som en merknad er forankret til.

trans-unit.source: Gets the group, if any, to which the annotation belongs.
trans-unit.target: Henter gruppen eventuelt merknaden tilhører.

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.AnnotationGroup"></xref> object that represents the group which the annotation belongs to.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.AnnotationGroup"> </xref> objektet som representerer gruppen som tilhører en merknad.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets an annotation's type name.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir typenavn for merknaden.

trans-unit.source: This property is used to get the name of each annotation type, for example, Line, Rectangle, Ellipse, and so forth.
trans-unit.target: Denne egenskapen brukes til å hente navnet på hver merknadstypen, for eksempel linje rektanglet, ellipsen og så videre.

trans-unit.source: The annotation type.
trans-unit.target: Merknadstypen.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the X axis to which an annotation is attached.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir X-aksen en merknad er knyttet til.

trans-unit.source: When an annotation is attached to an axis, its X position is always specified in axes coordinates.
trans-unit.target: Når en merknad er knyttet til en akse, er alltid X plasseringen angitt i akser koordinater.

trans-unit.source: To also define the size of an annotation in axes coordinates, make sure the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Annotation.IsSizeAlwaysRelative%2A> property is set to `false`.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil også definere størrelsen på en merknad i akser koordinater, kontroller at den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Annotation.IsSizeAlwaysRelative%2A>er satt til `false`.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Annotation.IsSizeAlwaysRelative%2A>

trans-unit.source: Set this value to `null` to disable attachment to the axis.
trans-unit.target: Sett denne verdien til `null` å deaktivere vedlegg til aksen.

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Axis"></xref> object to which the annotation is attached.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Axis"> </xref> objekt som merknaden er tilknyttet.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the name of the X axis to which an annotation is attached.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir navnet på X-aksen en merknad er knyttet til.

trans-unit.source: A <xref uid="langword_csharp_string" name="string" href=""></xref> value that represents the name of the X axis which an annotation is attached to.
trans-unit.target: En <xref uid="langword_csharp_string" name="string" href=""> </xref> verdi som representerer navnet på X-aksen som en merknad er knyttet til.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the Y axis to which an annotation is attached.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir Y-aksen en merknad er knyttet til.

trans-unit.source: When an annotation is attached to an axis, its Y position is always specified in axes coordinates.
trans-unit.target: Når en merknad er knyttet til en akse, er Y-posisjon alltid angitt i akser koordinater.

trans-unit.source: To also define the size of an annotation in axes coordinates, make sure the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Annotation.IsSizeAlwaysRelative%2A> property is set to `false`.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil også definere størrelsen på en merknad i akser koordinater, kontroller at den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Annotation.IsSizeAlwaysRelative%2A>er satt til `false`.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Annotation.IsSizeAlwaysRelative%2A>

trans-unit.source: Set to `null` to disable annotation attachment to an axis.
trans-unit.target: Satt til `null` å deaktivere merknad vedlegg i en akse.

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Axis"></xref> object to which this annotation is attached.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Axis"> </xref> objekt som denne merknaden er tilknyttet.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the name of the Y axis which an annotation is attached to.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir navnet på Y-aksen som en merknad er knyttet til.

trans-unit.source: A <xref uid="langword_csharp_string" name="string" href=""></xref> value that represents the name of the Y axis that an annotation is attached to.
trans-unit.target: En <xref uid="langword_csharp_string" name="string" href=""> </xref> verdi som representerer navnet på Y-aksen en merknad er knyttet til.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the color of an annotation background.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir fargen for merknadsbakgrunnen.

trans-unit.source: This property does not apply to line-type annotations, image annotations and text annotations.
trans-unit.target: Denne egenskapen gjelder ikke for linje-type merknader, image merknader og kommentarer.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"></xref> value used to draw an annotation background.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"> </xref> verdien brukes til å tegne merknadsbakgrunnen.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the gradient style of an annotation background.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir gradering stilen for merknadsbakgrunnen.

trans-unit.source: Two colors are used to draw the gradients, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Annotation.BackColor%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Annotation.BackSecondaryColor%2A>.
trans-unit.target: To farger brukes til å tegne graderinger, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Annotation.BackColor%2A>og <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Annotation.BackSecondaryColor%2A>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Annotation.BackSecondaryColor%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Annotation.BackColor%2A>

trans-unit.source: This property does not apply to line-type annotations, image annotations and text annotations.
trans-unit.target: Denne egenskapen gjelder ikke for linje-type merknader, image merknader og kommentarer.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.GradientStyle"></xref> value used to draw an annotation background.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.GradientStyle"> </xref> verdien brukes til å tegne merknadsbakgrunnen.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the hatching style of an annotation background.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir skravering stilen for merknadsbakgrunnen.

trans-unit.source: Two colors are used to draw the hatching, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Annotation.BackColor%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Annotation.BackSecondaryColor%2A>.
trans-unit.target: To farger brukes til å tegne skravering, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Annotation.BackColor%2A>og <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Annotation.BackSecondaryColor%2A>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Annotation.BackSecondaryColor%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Annotation.BackColor%2A>

trans-unit.source: This property does not apply to line-type annotations, image annotations and text annotations.
trans-unit.target: Denne egenskapen gjelder ikke for linje-type merknader, image merknader og kommentarer.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartHatchStyle"></xref> value used to draw the background.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartHatchStyle"> </xref> verdien brukes til å tegne bakgrunnen.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the secondary color of an annotation background.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir den sekundære fargen for merknadsbakgrunnen.

trans-unit.source: The secondary color is used with the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Annotation.BackColor%2A> when <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Annotation.BackHatchStyle%2A> or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Annotation.BackGradientStyle%2A> is used.
trans-unit.target: Den sekundære fargen brukes med den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Annotation.BackColor%2A>når <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Annotation.BackHatchStyle%2A>eller <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Annotation.BackGradientStyle%2A>brukes.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Annotation.BackGradientStyle%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Annotation.BackHatchStyle%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Annotation.BackColor%2A>

trans-unit.source: This property does not apply to line-type annotations, image annotations and text annotations.
trans-unit.target: Denne egenskapen gjelder ikke for linje-type merknader, image merknader og kommentarer.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"></xref> value used to draw an annotation background with hatching or gradient fill.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"> </xref> verdien brukes til å tegne merknadsbakgrunnen skravering eller gradering fyll.

trans-unit.source: Begins the end user placement of an annotation using the mouse.
trans-unit.target: Starter sluttbrukeren plasseringen av merknaden ved hjelp av musen.

trans-unit.source: When this method is called, the end user is allowed to place an annotation using the mouse.
trans-unit.target: Når denne metoden kalles, er sluttbrukeren tillatt å plassere en merknad ved hjelp av musen.

trans-unit.source: Placement finishes when the end user specifies all required points, or when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Annotation.EndPlacement%2A> method is called.
trans-unit.target: Plasseringen avsluttes når sluttbrukeren angir alle nødvendige punkt, eller når den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Annotation.EndPlacement%2A>-metoden.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Annotation.EndPlacement%2A>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the bottom boundary of an annotation position.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir den nedre kantlinjen i en posisjon for merknad.

trans-unit.source: To use axes coordinates, anchor an annotation to a data point using the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Annotation.AnchorDataPoint%2A> property, or set the annotation axes using the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Annotation.AxisX%2A> or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Annotation.AxisY%2A> properties and set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Annotation.IsSizeAlwaysRelative%2A> property to `false`.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil bruke akser koordinatene forankrer merknaden til et punkt med den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Annotation.AnchorDataPoint%2A>egenskapen, eller sett merknaden aksen ved hjelp av den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Annotation.AxisX%2A>eller <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Annotation.AxisY%2A>Egenskaper og sett den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Annotation.IsSizeAlwaysRelative%2A>egenskapen `false`.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Annotation.IsSizeAlwaysRelative%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Annotation.AxisY%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Annotation.AxisX%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Annotation.AnchorDataPoint%2A>

trans-unit.source: A <xref uid="langword_csharp_double" name="double" href=""></xref> value that represents the position of the bottom boundary of an annotation.
trans-unit.target: En <xref uid="langword_csharp_double" name="double" href=""> </xref> verdi som angir posisjonen for den nedre kantlinjen i en merknad.

trans-unit.source: Brings an annotation to the front of all annotations.
trans-unit.target: Gir en merknad foran alle kommentarer.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the name of the chart area to which an annotation is clipped.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir navnet på diagramområdet merknaden er beskåret som.

trans-unit.source: If the chart area name is specified, an annotation will only be drawn inside the plotting area of the chart area specified.
trans-unit.target: Hvis navnet på diagramområdet er angitt, tegnes bare en merknad i tegneområdet på diagramområdet som er angitt.

trans-unit.source: All parts of the annotation outside of the plotting area will be clipped.
trans-unit.target: Alle deler av merknaden utenfor tegneområdet beskjæres.

trans-unit.source: To disable chart area clipping, set the property to <xref:System.String>.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil deaktivere beskjæring området, kan du angi egenskapen til <xref:System.String>.</xref:System.String>

trans-unit.source: A <xref uid="langword_csharp_string" name="string" href=""></xref> that represents the name of an existing chart area to which an annotation is clipped.
trans-unit.target: En <xref uid="langword_csharp_string" name="string" href=""> </xref> som representerer navnet på et eksisterende diagramområdet som merknaden er beskåret.

trans-unit.source: Releases unmanaged resources and, optionally, managed resources.
trans-unit.target: Versjoner uforvaltet ressurser, og eventuelt administreres ressurser.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_True" name="True" href=""></xref> to release both unmanaged and managed resources; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> to release only unmanaged resources.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_True" name="True" href=""></xref>å frigjøre både uforvaltede og behandlede ressurser. <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref> frigi bare uforvaltede ressurser.

trans-unit.source: Ends the end user placement of an annotation.
trans-unit.target: Avslutter sluttbrukeren plasseringen av merknaden.

trans-unit.source: This method ends an annotation placement operation previously started by a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Annotation.BeginPlacement%2A> method call.
trans-unit.target: Denne metoden slutter en merknad plassering-operasjon startet tidligere av en <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Annotation.BeginPlacement%2A>metodekallet.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Annotation.BeginPlacement%2A>

trans-unit.source: Calling this method is not required, because placement will automatically end when an end user enters all required points.
trans-unit.target: Kaller denne metoden er ikke obligatorisk, fordi plasseringen avsluttes automatisk når sluttbrukeren angir alle nødvendige punkt.

trans-unit.source: However, it is useful when an annotation placement operation needs to be aborted for some reason.
trans-unit.target: Det er imidlertid nyttig når en operasjon for plasseringen av merknaden må ble avbrutt på grunn noen.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the font to use for the text of an annotation.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir skriften som skal brukes for teksten for en merknad.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Font"></xref> object used to draw the annotation text.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Drawing.Font"> </xref> objektet brukes til å tegne merknadsteksten.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the text color of an annotation.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir tekstfargen for merknaden.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"></xref> value used for the text color of an annotation.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"> </xref> verdien brukt for tekstfargen for merknaden.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the height of an annotation.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir høyden på en merknad.

trans-unit.source: The height of an annotation can be a negative value, in which case the annotation orientation is switched.
trans-unit.target: Høyden på en merknad kan være en negativ verdi som tilfellet merknad retningen er endret.

trans-unit.source: Annotation width can be in relative chart coordinates or in axes coordinates.
trans-unit.target: Bredden på merknaden kan være med relative diagramkoordinater eller i akser koordinater.

trans-unit.source: Chart relative coordinates are used by default.
trans-unit.target: Relative diagramkoordinater brukes som standard.

trans-unit.source: To use axes coordinates, anchor an annotation to a data point using the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Annotation.AnchorDataPoint%2A> property, or set the annotation axes using the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Annotation.AxisX%2A> or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Annotation.AxisY%2A> properties and set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Annotation.IsSizeAlwaysRelative%2A> property to `false`.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil bruke akser koordinatene forankrer merknaden til et punkt med den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Annotation.AnchorDataPoint%2A>egenskapen, eller sett merknaden aksen ved hjelp av den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Annotation.AxisX%2A>eller <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Annotation.AxisY%2A>Egenskaper og sett den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Annotation.IsSizeAlwaysRelative%2A>egenskapen `false`.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Annotation.IsSizeAlwaysRelative%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Annotation.AxisY%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Annotation.AxisX%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Annotation.AnchorDataPoint%2A>

trans-unit.source: Set the width to <xref:System.Double.NaN> to achieve automatic size calculation for annotations with text.
trans-unit.target: Angi bredden til <xref:System.Double.NaN>for automatisk størrelsesberegning for merknader med tekst.</xref:System.Double.NaN>

trans-unit.source: The size will automatically be calculated based on the annotation text and font size.
trans-unit.target: Størrelsen beregnes automatisk basert på skrift og merknadsstørrelsen.

trans-unit.source: A <xref uid="langword_csharp_double" name="double" href=""></xref> value that represents the height of an annotation.
trans-unit.target: En <xref uid="langword_csharp_double" name="double" href=""> </xref> verdi som angir høyden på en merknad.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a flag that determines if an annotation is selected.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir et flagg som bestemmer om en merknad er valgt.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the annotation is selected; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Hvis en merknad er valgt. Ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a flag that specifies whether the size of an annotation is always defined in relative chart coordinates.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir et flagg som angir om størrelsen på en merknad alltid defineres med relative diagramkoordinater.

trans-unit.source: The height and width of an annotation may be set in relative chart or in axes coordinates.
trans-unit.target: Høyden og bredden på en merknad kan angis i relativ diagrammet eller akser koordinater.

trans-unit.source: Relative chart coordinates are the default.
trans-unit.target: Relative diagramkoordinater er standard.

trans-unit.source: To express the size of an annotation in axes coordinates, set the IsSizeAlwaysRelative property to `false`.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil express størrelsen på en merknad i akser koordinater egenskapen IsSizeAlwaysRelative til `false`.

trans-unit.source: Then anchor the annotation to a data point or set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Annotation.AxisX%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Annotation.AxisY%2A> properties.
trans-unit.target: Deretter forankrer merknaden til ett datapunkt eller sett den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Annotation.AxisX%2A>og <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Annotation.AxisY%2A>Egenskaper.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Annotation.AxisY%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Annotation.AxisX%2A>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Annotation.Width*> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Annotation.Height*> of an annotation are always expressed in relative chart coordinates; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Hvis den <> </> *> og <> </> *> en merknad er alltid uttrykt med relative diagramkoordinater; ellers, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the line color of an annotation.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir linjefargen for merknaden.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"></xref> value used to draw an annotation's line.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"> </xref> verdien brukes til å tegne et merknadslinjen.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the line style of an annotation.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir linjestilen for merknaden.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartDashStyle"></xref> value used to draw the line style of an annotation.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartDashStyle"> </xref> verdien brukes til å tegne linjestilen for merknaden.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the line width of an annotation.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir linjetykkelsen for merknaden.

trans-unit.source: An <xref uid="langword_csharp_integer" name="integer" href=""></xref> value that defines the line width, in pixels, of an annotation.
trans-unit.target: En <xref uid="langword_csharp_integer" name="integer" href=""> </xref> verdi som definerer linjetykkelsen i piksler for merknaden.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the unique name of an annotation.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir det unike navnet på en merknad.

trans-unit.source: A <xref uid="langword_csharp_string" name="string" href=""></xref> that represents the unique name of an annotation.
trans-unit.target: En <xref uid="langword_csharp_string" name="string" href=""> </xref> som representerer det unike navnet på en merknad.

trans-unit.source: Resizes an annotation according to its content size.
trans-unit.target: Endrer størrelse på en merknad i henhold til størrelsen på innholdet.

trans-unit.source: Sets the annotation width and height to fit the specified text.
trans-unit.target: Angir merknad bredden og høyden for å tilpasses den angitte teksten.

trans-unit.source: This method applies to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.TextAnnotation>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.RectangleAnnotation>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.EllipseAnnotation> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.CalloutAnnotation> objects only.
trans-unit.target: Denne metoden gjelder <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.TextAnnotation>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.RectangleAnnotation>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.EllipseAnnotation>og <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.CalloutAnnotation>objekter bare.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.CalloutAnnotation> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.EllipseAnnotation> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.RectangleAnnotation> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.TextAnnotation>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > This method requires that the annotation be added to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.AnnotationCollection> to function correctly.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Denne metoden krever at merknaden legges til i <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.AnnotationCollection>skal fungere riktig.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.AnnotationCollection>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the right boundary position of an annotation.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir høyre kant posisjonen for merknaden.

trans-unit.source: To use axes coordinates, anchor an annotation to a data point using the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Annotation.AnchorDataPoint%2A> property, or set the annotation axes using the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Annotation.AxisX%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Annotation.AxisY%2A> properties and set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Annotation.IsSizeAlwaysRelative%2A> property to `false`.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil bruke akser koordinatene forankrer merknaden til et punkt med den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Annotation.AnchorDataPoint%2A>egenskapen, eller sett merknaden aksen ved hjelp av den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Annotation.AxisX%2A>og <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Annotation.AxisY%2A>Egenskaper og sett den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Annotation.IsSizeAlwaysRelative%2A>egenskapen `false`.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Annotation.IsSizeAlwaysRelative%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Annotation.AxisY%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Annotation.AxisX%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Annotation.AnchorDataPoint%2A>

trans-unit.source: A <xref uid="langword_csharp_double" name="double" href=""></xref> value that represents the position of the right boundary of an annotation.
trans-unit.target: En <xref uid="langword_csharp_double" name="double" href=""> </xref> verdi som angir posisjonen for den høyre kantlinjen av en merknad.

trans-unit.source: Sends an annotation to the back of all the annotations.
trans-unit.target: Sender en merknad på baksiden av alle kommentarer.

trans-unit.source: Sends an annotation to the back of the all annotations.
trans-unit.target: Sender en merknad på baksiden av alle kommentarer.

trans-unit.source: Anchors an annotation to the specified data point.
trans-unit.target: Forankrer merknaden til det angitte datapunktet.

trans-unit.source: Anchors an annotation to the specified data point.
trans-unit.target: Forankrer merknaden til det angitte datapunktet.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.DataPoint"></xref> to which the annotation will be anchored.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.DataPoint"> </xref> til som merknaden vil være forankret.

trans-unit.source: Anchors an annotation to two data points.
trans-unit.target: Forankrer merknaden på to datapunkt.

trans-unit.source: Anchors an annotation's top-left and bottom-right corners to the specified data points.
trans-unit.target: Forankrer merknaden øverste venstre og nedre høyre hjørne på de angitte datapunktene.

trans-unit.source: The first anchor <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.DataPoint"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Første ankeret <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.DataPoint"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The second anchor <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.DataPoint"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Andre ankeret <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.DataPoint"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the color of an annotation's shadow.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir fargen på skyggen for merknaden.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"></xref> value used to draw the annotation shadow.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"> </xref> verdien brukes til å tegne merknad skyggen.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the size of an annotation's shadow.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir størrelsen på skyggen for merknaden.

trans-unit.source: An <xref uid="langword_csharp_integer" name="integer" href=""></xref> value that represents the size of the shadow.
trans-unit.target: En <xref uid="langword_csharp_integer" name="integer" href=""> </xref> verdi som representerer størrelsen på skyggen.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the smart label style of an annotation.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir smart etikettstilen for en merknad.

trans-unit.source: Smart labels are used to prevent an annotation from overlapping the data point labels and other annotations.
trans-unit.target: Smartetiketter brukes til å hindre en merknad overlapper datapunktetiketter og andre merknader.

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > Data point labels must also have smart labels enabled.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Datapunktetiketter må også ha smartetiketter aktivert.

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.AnnotationSmartLabelStyle"></xref> object that represents an annotation's smart labels style properties.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.AnnotationSmartLabelStyle"> </xref> objektet som representerer merknaden smartkortet etikettene stilegenskaper.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the text style of an annotation.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir tekststilen for merknaden.

trans-unit.source: A TextStyle value used to draw the text of an annotation.
trans-unit.target: En tekststilen-verdi som brukes til å tegne teksten for en merknad.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the tooltip text for an annotation.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir teksten for verktøytipset for merknaden.

trans-unit.source: Special keywords can be used in the text when an annotation is anchored to a data point using the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Annotation.AnchorDataPoint%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Spesielle nøkkelord kan brukes i teksten når en merknad er forankret til et punkt med den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Annotation.AnchorDataPoint%2A>egenskapen.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Annotation.AnchorDataPoint%2A>

trans-unit.source: A <xref uid="langword_csharp_string" name="string" href=""></xref> value that represents the tooltip text for an annotation.
trans-unit.target: En <xref uid="langword_csharp_string" name="string" href=""> </xref> verdi som representerer teksten for verktøytipset for merknaden.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a flag that specifies whether an annotation is visible.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir et flagg som angir om en merknad er synlig.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the annotation is visible; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Hvis merknaden er synlige. Ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the width, in pixels, of an annotation.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir bredden på en merknad i piksler.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Annotation.Height%2A> property description.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil ha mer informasjon, se den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Annotation.Height%2A>egenskapsbeskrivelse.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Annotation.Height%2A>

trans-unit.source: A <xref uid="langword_csharp_double" name="double" href=""></xref> value that represents the width of an annotation.
trans-unit.target: En <xref uid="langword_csharp_double" name="double" href=""> </xref> verdi som angir en merknad.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the X coordinate of an annotation.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir X-koordinaten for merknaden.

trans-unit.source: The X coordinate of an annotation is specified in relative chart coordinates or in axes coordinates.
trans-unit.target: X-koordinaten for en merknad er angitt med relative diagramkoordinater eller i akser koordinater.

trans-unit.source: Relative chart coordinates are used by default.
trans-unit.target: Relative diagramkoordinater brukes som standard.

trans-unit.source: To use axes coordinates, anchor an annotation to a data point using the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Annotation.AnchorDataPoint%2A> property, or set the annotation axes using the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Annotation.AxisX%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Annotation.AxisY%2A> properties.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil bruke akser koordinatene forankrer merknaden til et punkt med den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Annotation.AnchorDataPoint%2A>egenskapen, eller sett merknaden aksen ved hjelp av den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Annotation.AxisX%2A>og <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Annotation.AxisY%2A>Egenskaper.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Annotation.AxisY%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Annotation.AxisX%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Annotation.AnchorDataPoint%2A>

trans-unit.source: Set the X position to <xref:System.Double.NaN> to automatically calculate position when the annotation has been anchored using the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Annotation.AnchorDataPoint%2A> property or the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Annotation.AnchorX%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Annotation.AnchorY%2A> properties.
trans-unit.target: Angi X-posisjon <xref:System.Double.NaN>til å beregne posisjon automatisk når en merknad er forankret ved hjelp av den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Annotation.AnchorDataPoint%2A>egenskapen eller <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Annotation.AnchorX%2A>og <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Annotation.AnchorY%2A>Egenskaper.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Annotation.AnchorY%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Annotation.AnchorX%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Annotation.AnchorDataPoint%2A> </xref:System.Double.NaN>

trans-unit.source: A <xref uid="langword_csharp_double" name="double" href=""></xref> value that represents the X coordinate of an annotation's position.
trans-unit.target: En <xref uid="langword_csharp_double" name="double" href=""> </xref> verdi som representerer X-koordinaten for plasseringen av merknaden.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the Y coordinate of the annotation.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir Y-koordinaten for merknaden.

trans-unit.source: The Y coordinate of an annotation is specified in relative chart coordinates or in axes coordinates.
trans-unit.target: Y-koordinaten for en merknad er angitt med relative diagramkoordinater eller i akser koordinater.

trans-unit.source: Relative chart coordinates are used by default.
trans-unit.target: Relative diagramkoordinater brukes som standard.

trans-unit.source: To use axes coordinates, anchor an annotation to a data point using the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Annotation.AnchorDataPoint%2A> property, or set the annotation axes using the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Annotation.AxisX%2A> or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Annotation.AxisY%2A> properties.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil bruke akser koordinatene forankrer merknaden til et punkt med den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Annotation.AnchorDataPoint%2A>egenskapen, eller sett merknaden aksen ved hjelp av den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Annotation.AxisX%2A>eller <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Annotation.AxisY%2A>Egenskaper.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Annotation.AxisY%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Annotation.AxisX%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Annotation.AnchorDataPoint%2A>

trans-unit.source: Set the Y position to <xref:System.Double.NaN> to automatically calculate the position when the annotation has been anchored using the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Annotation.AnchorDataPoint%2A> property or the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Annotation.AnchorX%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Annotation.AnchorY%2A> properties.
trans-unit.target: Angi Y-posisjon <xref:System.Double.NaN>til å beregne posisjonen automatisk når en merknad er forankret ved hjelp av den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Annotation.AnchorDataPoint%2A>egenskapen eller <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Annotation.AnchorX%2A>og <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Annotation.AnchorY%2A>Egenskaper.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Annotation.AnchorY%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Annotation.AnchorX%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Annotation.AnchorDataPoint%2A> </xref:System.Double.NaN>

trans-unit.source: A <xref uid="langword_csharp_double" name="double" href=""></xref> value that represents the Y coordinate of an annotation's position.
trans-unit.target: En <xref uid="langword_csharp_double" name="double" href=""> </xref> verdi som representerer Y-koordinaten for plasseringen av merknaden.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the name of the Y axis to which an annotation is attached.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir navnet på Y-aksen en merknad er knyttet til.

trans-unit.source: A <xref uid="langword_csharp_string" name="string" href=""></xref> value that represents the name of the Y axis which an annotation is attached to.
trans-unit.target: En <xref uid="langword_csharp_string" name="string" href=""> </xref> verdi som representerer navnet på Y-aksen som en merknad er knyttet til.
